collection:
This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use,
and protect your information.

Collection of Personal Data**

Our website is hosted on Squarespace, which collects personal data when you
visit our site.

This includes information about your browser, network, and
device, web pages you visited before coming to our website, and your IP
address.

We also use analytics and performance
cookies to view site traffic and activity.

Analytics**

We collect personal data to power our site analytics, including information
about your browser, network, and device, web pages you visited prior to coming
to our site, and your IP address.

Third-Party Services**

If our website includes third-party integrations like Google Maps, OpenAI’s
API’s generative AI services or Microsoft Geospatial datasets, these services
may collect information about your interaction with them.

Data for Fulfilling Services**

For Purchases: If you buy a product on our website, we collect personal
information like your name, email address, phone number, billing, and shipping
address to fulfill your order.

For Form Submissions: When you submit information via a webform, we collect
the data you provide to track and respond to your inquiries.

For Scheduling: If you book an appointment on our site, we collect information
like your name, email address, phone number, and appointment details.

Use of Share Buttons and Blog Comments**

Share Buttons: If enabled, share buttons on our site let you share content to
third-party services, which may collect personal data like your browser
information and IP address.

Blog Comments: If our site includes a commenting feature, we collect data like
your name, email address, and website URL when you post a comment.

These services
may receive personal information about you, such as your browser details and
IP address, for proper font rendering.
